discussion.p: The pointer-safety API is nothing to do with smart pointers, so does not belong in . In fact it is a set of language support features are really belongs in clause , with the contents declared in a header that deals with language-support of memory management.
discussion.blockquote: Agree in principle, but not with the proposed resolution. We believe it belongs either a subsection of either or as part of the general reorganization of . The declaration should stay in <memory>.
